definition: pieces of chicken or other meat stewed in gravy with e.g. carrots and onions and served with noodles or dumplings, make a fricassee of by cooking
details:
noun
- pieces of chicken or other meat stewed in gravy with e.g. carrots and onions and served with noodles or dumplings
verb
